data.lyric:
[ti:Stick That In Your Country Song]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Stick That In Your Country Song]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Stick That In Your Country Song - Eric Church
[00:02.75]Lyrics by：Davis Naish/Jeffrey Steele
[00:05.51]Composed by：Davis Naish/Jeffrey Steele
[00:08.26]Take me on up to Detroit City
[00:11.05]Jails are full the factories empty
[00:13.58]Mama's crying young boys dying
[00:16.21]Under that red white and blue still flying
[00:19.03]Drop me off in Baltimore
[00:21.48]Where every other window's got a plywood board
[00:24.03]Where dreams become d**gs and guns
[00:26.72]The only way out is to shoot or run
[00:29.96]Stick that in your country song yeah
[00:32.54]Take that one to number one yeah
[00:35.06]And get the whole world singing along yeah
[00:37.85]Stick that in your country song yeah
[00:42.85]Oh
[00:51.01]Sing about the man coming back from war
[00:53.33]A 23 going on 54
[00:56.07]He lost a friend his sight his hands
[00:58.73]Baby girl he'll never see again
[01:01.91]Stick that in your country song yeah
[01:04.55]Take that one to number one yeah
[01:06.99]And get the whole world singing along man
[01:09.85]Stick that in your country song yeah
[01:14.85]Oh
[01:22.91]I light the arrow pull the bow
[01:25.45]Shoot that fire right through my soul
[01:27.99]Hit my pride fist up high
[01:30.28]I wanna feel the rush I wanna feel alive
[01:33.68]Oh come on I want to pound the dash
[01:36.17]Stomp the gas drive too fast
[01:38.80]Rock me hard stop my heart
[01:41.43]And blow the speakers right out of this car
[01:44.59]Stick that in your country song yeah
[01:47.12]And take that one to number one yeah
[01:48.80]Number one yeah
[01:49.78]And get the whole world singing along man
[01:52.57]Stick that in your country song
[01:55.19]Stick that in your country song
[01:57.86]Take that one to number one
[02:00.45]I can sing this all night long yeah
[02:03.10]Stick that in your country song yeah
[02:08.52]Oh
[02:26.74]Gimme one about the teacher who
[02:29.32]Tryna change a life or two
[02:31.80]She'll be rocking out all night with you
[02:34.62]Tomorrow she'll be back in a red-brick school
[02:37.28]Where kids are climbing off the walls
[02:39.94]And it's scary walking down the hall
[02:42.66]She's underpaid she's overworked
[02:45.19]Come on man shout one out to her
[02:48.58]Stick that in your country song come on
[02:51.23]Take that one to number one yeah
[02:53.76]And get the whole world singing along
[02:56.47]Stick that in your country song
[02:59.19]Stick that in your country song
[03:01.84]Take that one to number one yeah
[03:03.75]Number one yeah
[03:04.41]And get the whole world singing along yeah
[03:07.07]Stick that in your country song yeah
[03:12.05]Hey oh
[03:15.22]Stick that in your country song yeah
[03:17.79]Oh
[03:20.55]Get the whole world singing along
[03:22.25]Singin' along oh
[03:25.86]Stick that in a country song
[03:28.08]Oh
data.trans:
[ti:Stick That In Your Country Song]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Stick That In Your Country Song]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.75]//
[00:05.50]//
[00:08.26]带我去底特律
[00:11.05]监牢人满为患 工厂空空荡荡
[00:13.58]妈妈在哭泣 孩子在死去
[00:16.21]红白蓝的旗帜 随风飘扬
[00:19.03]让我在巴尔的摩下车
[00:21.48]那里每扇窗户都加装了胶合板
[00:24.03]梦想变成了*品和枪支
[00:26.72]要向逃出生天 要么开枪 要么拼命逃
[00:29.96]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[00:32.54]把这种问题放在最重要的位置
[00:35.06]让全世界一起唱
[00:37.85]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[00:42.85]//
[00:51.01]唱唱那个从战场上归来的男人
[00:53.33]明明只有二十三岁 看起来却像五十四岁
[00:56.07]他失去了朋友 失去了视力 失去了双手
[00:58.73]再也见不到他心爱的女孩
[01:01.91]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[01:04.55]把这种问题放在最重要的位置
[01:06.99]让全世界都一起唱 朋友
[01:09.85]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[01:14.85]//
[01:22.91]我搭箭拉弓
[01:25.45]子弹穿过我的灵魂
[01:27.99]打击我的骄傲 高高举起拳头
[01:30.28]我想感受那种冲动 我想体会活着的感觉
[01:33.68]拜托 我想赶紧离开
[01:36.17]脚踩油门 飞速行驶
[01:38.80]让我激动不已 让我心跳停止
[01:41.43]把车里的音响放得震天响
[01:44.59]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[01:47.12]把这种问题放在最重要的位置
[01:48.80]第一位
[01:49.78]让全世界都一起唱 朋友
[01:52.57]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[01:55.19]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[01:57.86]把这种问题放在最重要的位置
[02:00.45]这样的歌我可以唱一整夜
[02:03.10]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[02:08.52]//
[02:26.74]让我给你讲讲那位老师
[02:29.32]她想改变一两个人
[02:31.80]她会和你狂欢一整夜
[02:34.62]明天她就会回到红砖大学里
[02:37.28]孩子们从围墙上爬下来
[02:39.94]在走廊走路都会很恐怖
[02:42.66]她的报酬太低 她的工作太累
[02:45.19]拜托 朋友 多关注她一点吧
[02:48.58]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里 拜托
[02:51.23]把这种问题放在最重要的位置
[02:53.76]让全世界都一起唱
[02:56.47]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[02:59.19]把那些事情都写进你的乡村歌曲里
[03:01.84]把这种问题放在最重要的位置
